scripts.postinstall: npm run setup:quant || echo '⚠️ 量化系統安裝失敗，請手動執行 npm run setup:quant'
scripts.setup:quant: cd tw-quant-simple && python3 -m venv .venv && . .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "前端,量化" -c "cyan,green" "vite" "cd tw-quant-simple && . .venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn web.app:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000"
